name: Anna's Archive Ebook Search - Web Scrapping based
description:
Searches for eBooks from Anna's Archive, and returns information including title, author, year, Anna's archive page url, MD5.

Supports searching by title, author and keywords. Includes optional category filter.

If a complex query fails, try searching just with a title, or just with an author.

Note : the reliability of this tool might fluctuate.
- It is based on web scrapping, so changes in Anna's Archive website might break the search feature. Feel free to fork and update the tool's code.
- Anna's Archive search servers might be slow. You sometimes have to retry your search.
author: @@official.shinkai

sort.description: Optional sort order: 'newest', 'oldest', 'largest', 'smallest' or null/None for default.

search_query.description: Book title, author, or other query to search for on annas-archive.org

file_type.description: Optional file extension filter: 'pdf', 'epub', 'cbr', 'cbz' or null/None for all. Case-insensitive.

num_results.description: How many relevant results to return (positive integer). Default: 5

error.description: Error message if an error occurred, otherwise null

output_reading_instructions.description: Instructions about how to present results to the user (e.g., include clickable page_url and thumbnail markdown).

results.description: Array of result items up to the requested number.

MD5.description: 32 hex MD5 string if available, otherwise null

author.description: Author of the item, or null if not available

date.description: Publication or upload date, or null

format.description: File format (e.g., pdf, epub, cbz, cbr) or null

language.description: Language of the book if available, or null

page_url.description: Full absolute clickable URL to the book's page

size.description: File size string if available (e.g., '12 MB') or null

thumbnail.description: Markdown image insertion format like '![Alt text](URL)' or null
